extendedInfo.description: Discover TibiaME, a free-to-play cross-platform fantasy MMORPG! Join thousands of players in TibiaME and help your friends fight against dangerous monsters in the colourful world of TibiaME. Become a legend of your own and prove your skills against other players in PvP!FEATURES- Itâs online - since 2003 (Guiness World Record) - Persistent gameworld. Your actions make a difference!- Classic 2D RPG experience- Collect & trade thousands of items- Challenging team quests and boss fights- Hundreds of different monsters- Hundreds hand crafted unique quests- Full character customizationPLAY ANYTIME AND ANYWHERESlay your enemy while waiting for the bus or save the princess in your lunch break.Play TibiaME online - anytime and anywhere!REGULAR UPDATESThe game is updated on a regular basis. In addition you can look forward to some great events across the year, like finding dragon eggs and fighting the evil Dragons across all islands.PREMIUM ITEMSItems purchased in the application can be used on all platforms where TibiaME is available: Android, iOS, Windows Phone, Web, Symbian, J2ME, Blackberry.REFERENCE:You will like this game if you play MMORPGs like World of Warcraft, Pocket Legends, Star Legends, Order & Chaos Online, Empore Onlone, World of Magic, Yslandia, Tibia, Age of Heroes Online.FOLLOW US:Official Website: http://www.tibiame.comFacebook: http://www.facebook.com/TibiaME

reviews.title: Stupid gamejchbf
reviews.comment: the whole game isxxrxrnb easy but the item they have is a problem, a lot have been removed and useless but hard to get, dying lost exp? ok, But lost like 5% or 10% from total exp, dafuq? also, it didnt gave people chance of having platinum or even premium.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game, with a slight after taste of remorse
reviews.comment: I would just like to say thanks for creating such an amazing game. However its rather dis-hearting how much exp you lose when you die.As a result I\'ve swore never to play tibiame again. But for the fustrated people out there, why don\'t you create a way for people to regain exp after death, such as a stone of regret\\remorse which you buy with platinum coins and use to regain lossed exp- will re-attract old players that gave up because of...However make the life insurance cheaper so people will still buy it.
reviews.author: Roshane Edwards

reviews.title: Problems, huge problems
reviews.comment: I can barely play 2 mins AND IT CRASHES! please guys PLEASE fix this!

reviews.title: Everything fixed and back to normal
reviews.comment: Well done guys! Still my favourite game :-) thank you.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome, huge, really detailed 2ish d world...mmorpgs worth playing on mobile are rare. Premium for 1.30 a week so very doable subscription if u want access to the entire world.  Very glad I gave this one a shot. Pc version is nice too reminds me of uo

reviews.comment: Great game but laggy on my tablet. And its a fast tablet, NFS Most Wanted and Asphalt 7 worked at the same speed as this game so its not possible because the graphic comparison here and there are massive. Please fix the FPS rate and I will give 5 stars
